FuncDef: This command configures the retry-count and response-timeout for GTP messages.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the interval, in seconds, between retransmission of signaling request messages towards the same peer Mobile Gateway. Values-1 to 30. ParamDefault: Default- 5
Specifies the number of times a signaling request message is transmitted towards the same peer Mobile Gateway. Values-1 to 8. ParamDefault: Default- 3
